content.raw:
When `libplayer*` is installed on my debian system, I am unable to compile Gazebo 3.0 (default branch) and instead get:

```
/home/dave/ros/ws_gazebo/gazebo/interfaces/player/player.h:22:38: fatal error: libplayercore/playercore.h: No such file or directory
```

But I have libplayercore3.0-dev installed. There does not appear to be a -I/usr/include/player3.0 when I compile. I do have the file:

```
/usr/include/player-3.0/libplayercore/playercore.h
```
The compile flags are:
```
cd /home/dave/ros/ws_gazebo/gazebo/build/gazebo/gui && /usr/bin/c++   -Dgazebo_gui_EXPORTS -DLIBBULLET_VERSION=0.0 -DQT_GUI_LIB -DQT_CORE_LIB -DQT_NO_DEBUG -g -O2 -mssse3 -msse3 -mfpmath=sse -msse -msse2  -Wall -Wextra -Wno-long-long
```

From [Gazebo Answers](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/5269/drcsim-precise-hydro/?comment=5279#comment-5279)

I was able to compile by uninstalling libplayer*
content.html:
When libplayer* is installed on my debian system, I am unable to compile Gazebo 3.0 (default branch) and instead get:

/home/dave/ros/ws_gazebo/gazebo/interfaces/player/player.h:22:38: fatal error: libplayercore/playercore.h: No such file or directory

But I have libplayercore3.0-dev installed. There does not appear to be a -I/usr/include/player3.0 when I compile. I do have the file:

/usr/include/player-3.0/libplayercore/playercore.h

The compile flags are:

cd /home/dave/ros/ws_gazebo/gazebo/build/gazebo/gui && /usr/bin/c++   -Dgazebo_gui_EXPORTS -DLIBBULLET_VERSION=0.0 -DQT_GUI_LIB -DQT_CORE_LIB -DQT_NO_DEBUG -g -O2 -mssse3 -msse3 -mfpmath=sse -msse -msse2  -Wall -Wextra -Wno-long-long

From Gazebo Answers

I was able to compile by uninstalling libplayer*
